titles.title: South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1994
A bill to establish the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4730-4731, S4733-4734)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 4/21/1994--Introduced. South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Act of 1994 - Establishes: (1) the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor in the State of South Carolina; and (2) the South Carolina National Heritage Corridor Commission to assist Federal, State, and local authorities and the private sector in developing and implementing an integrated management action plan for the Corridor. Authorizes appropriations.
